title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
subtitle: The story of William Kamkwamba, aka "The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind," is true, but it isn't new and has been extensively covered in the media.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Based on information he learned from library books, school drop-out William Kamkwamba built a windmill out of scrap parts and brought electricity to his village in Malawi.
